metadata.description: Personal plugins for productivity and workflow automation

plugins.name: workflow-manager
plugins.description: Unified workflow management across Slack, Confluence, Jira, GitHub, and Google Calendar

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: Developer workflow automation - Git, PR, code review with Jira/Slack/Confluence

plugins.name: pm-workflow
plugins.description: PM workflow automation - Jira tickets, PRD, release notes, stakeholder updates

plugins.name: de-workflow
plugins.description: Designer workflow automation - Figma, design specs, dev handoff

plugins.name: workflow-common
plugins.description: Common workflow commands - role selection, unified status
